treatments.name: Aromatherapy Full Body Massage
treatments.description: Aromatherapy is a treatment using natural essential oils. These oils are massaged into the skin, & diffused throughout the room . We combine Aromatherapy with a full body message leaving your body & mind revitalized & renewed

treatments.name: Acupuncture
treatments.description: Acupuncture has been used for centuries to help relive numerous ailments. Acupuncture involves placing very fine needles in pacific parts of the body to reduce pain & improve many other ailments.

treatments.name: Reflexology
treatments.description: There are reflexes in the feet relative to each part of the body. Reflexology is the practice of stimulating parts of the feet to encourage a beneficial effect on other parts of the body.

treatments.name: Reiki
treatments.description: Reiki is a Japanese form of energy healing. Reiki can help reduce stress & anxiety aid the body to become energetically balanced physically, emotionally, spiritually & mentally

treatments.name: Full Aromatherapy Including Reflexology
treatments.description: Combining two of our most popular treatments for those who need it. Breathe in & relax with our natural essential oils while detoxing your body and soul with reflexology.

treatments.name: Two Hour Deluxe Combined Treatments Of Your Choice
treatments.description: Choose any two treatments we offer, you can split the service for one hour each or extend your preferred treatment

conditions.title: Chronic sleep disorders
conditions.description: Whether you need to improve quality of sleep or have a sleep disorder, we can offer a tailored treatments for improved sleep & vitality.

conditions.title: Irritation, stress & mood
conditions.description: Chronic stress can contribute to poor health & wellbeing. Our Aromatherapy Full Body Massages are prefect to reduce stress & help balance your Qi.

conditions.title: Skin problems
conditions.description: Skin problems can often be a sign of toxins accumulating in the body. Reflexology can help bring your body back to balance & optimize your overall health.

conditions.title: Migraine, aches & pains
conditions.description: Acupuncture can be a great choice for those suffering with tension headaches & migraines. Acupuncture is one of our most popular treatments and can help treat a wide range of health conditions.

reviews.name: Mary
reviews.review: I feel renewed, I had a one hour reiki session with Laura & feel amazing! Highly recommend.

reviews.name: Alison
reviews.review: Laura was amazing. I had two sessions so far and my energy has improved so much

reviews.name: Sam
reviews.review: I can't believe how much better I sleep now. I had one session with Sarah & my sleep has improved along with my stress levels going down.

teamMembers.name: Sarah
teamMembers.description: Hi, I'm Sarah, I joined the team nearly 3 years ago and have a deep passion for holistic healing & reflexology.

teamMembers.name: Alex
teamMembers.description: Hi, I'm Alex, I started my journey in naturopathic healing more then 6 years ago and never looked back. I have a passion for vegan cooking & meditation.
